pages.text: Have you ever needed to mark a point that was visible from far away?$(br2)Well, that's what flares are for. They'll release particles so you can see it from far away. And of course, they'll light up areas like caves too.
$(o)Deals $(l)1.0$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information. Hitting entities will catch them on fire.
